guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"asfa6","text":"This protocol is slight modification from the original protocol published. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ha7a","text":"Shi J, Xue C, Liu W, Zhang H. Differentiation of Human-Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells to Macrophages for Disease Modeling and Functional Genomics. Curr Protoc Stem Cell Biol. 2019;48","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3aj6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck2s3","text":"This original published protocol involves differentiation of iPSCs into CD34 positive hematopoietic progenitors by embryoid body generation on low attachment plates. Embryoid body generation is laborious, time consuming and costly. This protocol also requires FACS sorting of hematopoietic progenitors. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gkp9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cavc","text":"The CD34 positive progenitors can be differentiated without the embryoid body generation step and FACS sorting by using STEMdiff™ Hematopoietic Kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"epthb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae41g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"11tqc","text":"Day-2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aitt8","text":"Coat 3 wells of a 6 well pates with Matrigel. (1 hour coating also works).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"78p3j","text":"The differentiation protocol involves two steps. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2e4eu","text":"1. iPSC differentiation into CD34 positive hematopoietic progenitors ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ansr","text":"2. Hematopoietic progenitors’ differentiation into mature Macrophages","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a2h2a","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6ouj3","text":"Note: This differentiation protocol requires healthy iPSCs approximately 50-60% confluency with nice tight colonies.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"61pur","text":"Day-1: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"931l8","text":"Bring iPSC maintenance to plate cell culture hood, remove the media and rinse once with PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7c6fq","text":"Then add   of   EDTA to the well and leave in the incubator for about  . By this time, you will see colonies lifting from the plates. If not leave plate in the incubator for few more minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ov61","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dd790","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"CBA67050FAC411EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"CE6C2000FAC411EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"DA4125B0FAC411EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"r25d","text":"Note: Do not tap or pipet to lift off the cells from the plate. This protocol requires a clumps off iPSC colonies for good yield of hematopoietic progenitors.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d822","text":"Once the 50 to 60% of colonies come off the plate, bring plate into the hood and neutralize the reaction by adding   of E8+Ri media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5rpg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"08CF5460FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar6b2","text":"Now gently swirl the plate to mix EDTA solution containing cells and E8+Ri media. (Never pipet, this mechanical force will disrupt the clumps).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"392mc","text":"After swirling the plate pipet   of the cells with 5 ml pipet into 15 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8njfb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"15711FF0FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pp6c","text":"Spin down the cells at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2a22","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ek8qs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2C3CD940FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":1324}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7mqus","text":"This slow spin is required for avoiding single cells smaller clumps.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aupe5","text":"After this spin, take aspirate the supernatant and gently tap the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"muf0","text":"Then add   of E8+Ri media and tap gently once again to mix the clumps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0re","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"48F85910FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61hvo","text":"For counting the clump number take   of this mix into a 96 well plate, add   of E8 media. Gently tap the plate and count the colonies under the microscope. Repeat this in 3 wells of 96 well plate and average the clump number.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f702u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"5003EFD0FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"53F43CD0FAC511EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76l46","text":"Now bring the Matrigel coated plate, aspirate the Matrigel and add   of E8+Ri media (3 well were coated on day 0).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5f5bn","text":"Now plate 10 clumps in 1st well, 20 clumps in 2nd well and 30 clumps in 3rd well of the 6 well plate*. Shake the plate up and down and to sides, return the plate to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":24,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":73,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d68au","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"93mhb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"A515C260FAD811EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bbgtm","text":"Since counting of clumps is arbitrary, it is never perfect. This exercise is essential till you get very good experience in plating the clumps.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"et72v","text":"Day 0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3t8go","text":"Count the colonies in in each well, ideal colony number is between 10-30. It doesn’t have to be perfect number. Wells with as low as 5 colonies and max up to 30 can also be used. Anything above 40 should be avoided.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sfce","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21bn7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fl0gv","text":"Note: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cjlhj","text":"Each clump should have 20-40 cells. If you have smaller colonies change media to E8 only and let the colonies grow for 1-2 days. ","type":"ordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"68s29","text":"Above 30 clumps number differentiation may not work because mesodermal cells require space to migrate and differentiate into hematopoietic progenitors.","type":"ordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rsqk","text":"Choose on well with desired number of colonies and you can discontinue maintaining remaining wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdddo","text":"After achieving desired colony number prepare Media A (  base media +   supplement A).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"t2a7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"26F1E8D0FAC611EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"2944D980FAC611EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l5om","text":"Aspirate E8+Ri media and add   Media A and leave plate in incubator for 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4j895","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"3A56DB00FAC711EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ccsdu","text":"Day 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfukh","text":"Add   A (  base media +   supplement A).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agsfb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"42CFBD60FAC711EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"453EC190FAC711EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"4783CF90FAC711EDB1276580097593CA","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
